Empire API Python client
========================

`Empire <http://empiredata.co>`__ is an API for accessing enterprise
SaaS services such as Salesforce, Zendesk, Google Apps, etc. It provides
a uniform, database-like interface to every service that it supports.
Empire makes it easy to integrate data from multiple enterprise services
into your own enterprise app.

Installation and Usage
----------------------

Please see the `Python client
documentation <http://empiredata.co/doc/python/>`__.
